alert.note: Alert for Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy; Northern Hidalgo; Southern Hidalgo; Starr (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Watch issued December 20 at 2:15PM CST until December 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE THURSDAY NIGHT THROUGH FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 possible. * WHERE...Hidalgo, Starr, Inland Willacy, and Inland Cameron Counties. * WHEN...From late Thursday night through Friday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Inland Cameron; Inland Willacy; Northern Hidalgo; Southern Hidalgo; Starr
